You Have Questions, We Have Answers
-----------------------------------

Our smartest customers have lots of questions. We’ve done our best to answer them.  
Have a unique question? Let’s get in touch.

CONTACT SALES

#### [How does the 14 day free trial work? +](https://www.klenty.com/pricing#collapseOne)

After signing up, get full access to all features for 14 days and send up to 200 emails to prospects. When you are ready, upgrade to a plan using your credit card. If you choose not to upgrade, your account will be deactivated.

#### [What happens after my 14-day free trial? +](https://www.klenty.com/pricing#collapseTwo)

After your free trial ends, we can hop on a consultation session to discuss a possible trial extension. And which plans are best for your sales team’s goals.

#### [Can I upgrade or downgrade any time? +](https://www.klenty.com/pricing#collapseThree)

Yes, you can. Klenty is a pay as you go service. Cancel anytime with no cancellation fees and you will not be charged for the subsequent billing period.

#### [Will I get support assistance during the free trial? +](https://www.klenty.com/pricing#collapsefour)

Yes, 24/5 dedicated support will be available. We also offer an extensive list of help docs to assist you every step of the way.

#### [How secure is the Klenty Platform? +](https://www.klenty.com/pricing#collapsefive)

You can safely trust your sensitive business data with Klenty. We’re SOC 2 Type II certified and GDPR-compliant.

#### [How many users can avail the free trial simultaneously? +](https://www.klenty.com/pricing#collapsesix)

You can bring your entire team onto your Klenty free trial. No limitations. Try Klenty for free.

#### [What is the quality of your support? +](https://www.klenty.com/pricing#collapseseven)

Klenty’s Customer Support is available 24/5. We respond within 2.5 minutes.  
  
Here’s what Nicolai, a Klenty customer said on G2.  
  
“A very good reason to work with Klenty is the Customer Success and Customer support teams. Klenty responds incredibly fast. Their Customer Success team consists of passionate people who listen and genuinely work to help you reach your goals.”

#### [Can I access all of Klenty's features during the free trial? +](https://www.klenty.com/pricing#collapseeight)

Yes. You’ll get full, unrestricted access to our all Sales Engagement capabilities during the trial. Curious about our platform? [Watch a pre-recorded overview of Klenty.](https://www.klenty.com/resources/videos/?ref=pricing)

#### [Can I cancel my account at any time? +](https://www.klenty.com/pricing#collapsenine)

Yes- you can cancel your account at any time. No cancellation fees. You will not be charged for the subsequent billing period.

#### [How is Klenty different from traditional Sales Engagement Tools? +](https://www.klenty.com/pricing#collapseten)

B2B buyers have evolved. Buying journeys are longer and more complex today.  
  
Yet legacy sales automation tools force sales teams to execute the same activities for every prospect.  
  
This means your reps only perform ‘demand capture’, burning prospects without accounting for their buying journey.  
  
This leads to insufficient pipeline, unmet quotas, and a lack of predictability.  
  
Klenty is the only Sales Engagement Platform built to simultaneously capture active buyers and nurture passive buyers.  
  
Out-of-the-box playbooks, workflows, and sales KPI trackers guide your reps to target prospects based on intent stages, execute personalized outreach across the right channels and get more meetings booked.

You Have Questions, We Have Answers
-----------------------------------

Our smartest customers have lots of questions. We’ve done our best to answer them.  
Have a unique question? Let’s get in touch.

CONTACT SALES

#### [How does the 14 day free trial work? +](https://www.klenty.com/sales-engagement-platform/pricing#collapseOne)

After signing up, get full access to all features for 14 days and send up to 200 emails to prospects. When you are ready, upgrade to a plan using your credit card. If you choose not to upgrade, your account will be deactivated.

#### [What happens after my 14-day free trial? +](https://www.klenty.com/sales-engagement-platform/pricing#collapseTwo)

After your free trial ends, we can hop on a consultation session to discuss a possible trial extension. And which plans are best for your sales team’s goals.

#### [Can I upgrade or downgrade any time? +](https://www.klenty.com/sales-engagement-platform/pricing#collapseThree)

Yes, you can. Klenty is a pay as you go service. Cancel anytime with no cancellation fees and you will not be charged for the subsequent billing period.

#### [Will I get support assistance during the free trial? +](https://www.klenty.com/sales-engagement-platform/pricing#collapsefour)

Yes, 24/5 dedicated support will be available. We also offer an extensive list of help docs to assist you every step of the way.

#### [How secure is the Klenty Platform? +](https://www.klenty.com/sales-engagement-platform/pricing#collapsefive)

You can safely trust your sensitive business data with Klenty. We’re SOC 2 Type II certified and GDPR-compliant.

#### [How many users can avail the free trial simultaneously? +](https://www.klenty.com/sales-engagement-platform/pricing#collapsesix)

You can bring your entire team onto your Klenty free trial. No limitations. Try Klenty for free.

#### [What is the quality of your support? +](https://www.klenty.com/sales-engagement-platform/pricing#collapseseven)

Klenty’s Customer Support is available 24/5. We respond within 2.5 minutes.  
  
Here’s what Nicolai, a Klenty customer said on G2.  
  
“A very good reason to work with Klenty is the Customer Success and Customer support teams. Klenty responds incredibly fast. Their Customer Success team consists of passionate people who listen and genuinely work to help you reach your goals.”

#### [Can I access all of Klenty's features during the free trial? +](https://www.klenty.com/sales-engagement-platform/pricing#collapseeight)

Yes. You’ll get full, unrestricted access to our all Sales Engagement capabilities during the trial. Curious about our platform? [Watch a pre-recorded overview of Klenty.](https://www.klenty.com/resources/videos/?ref=pricing)

#### [Can I cancel my account at any time? +](https://www.klenty.com/sales-engagement-platform/pricing#collapsenine)

Yes- you can cancel your account at any time. No cancellation fees. You will not be charged for the subsequent billing period.

#### [How is Klenty different from traditional Sales Engagement Tools? +](https://www.klenty.com/sales-engagement-platform/pricing#collapseten)

B2B buyers have evolved. Buying journeys are longer and more complex today.  
  
Yet legacy sales automation tools force sales teams to execute the same activities for every prospect.  
  
This means your reps only perform ‘demand capture’, burning prospects without accounting for their buying journey.  
  
This leads to insufficient pipeline, unmet quotas, and a lack of predictability.  
  
Klenty is the only Sales Engagement Platform built to simultaneously capture active buyers and nurture passive buyers.  
  
Out-of-the-box playbooks, workflows, and sales KPI trackers guide your reps to target prospects based on intent stages, execute personalized outreach across the right channels and get more meetings booked.
